item.description:
I am posting this meet up for any SEALs who want to make a pilgrimage out to Deerfield to Ron Helwig's First Church of the Gun.

A description from one member is:
"Ron Helwig and the other folks at the house have set up a range in the backyard, and invited everyone in the pro-liberty community to come over on Sunday afternoons (usually 1-3:30pm) to practice. It's especially great for beginners like me to have experienced people show me the ropes
and supervise my learning process, and it's also a great deal of fun - and an absolutely beautiful setting, in the trees facing a lake.

If your kids are well behaved, and you feel comfortable with teaching them gun safety, feel free to bring them as well. It's a family-friendly environment."

Details and directions are at:
http://ronhelwig.com/...
http://ronhelwig.com/...

I have set the meetup location to be the Puterbaugh home, in case any Seacoast-area folks want to car pool and/or caravan. Otherwise, please meet at the range. We will be leaving our house at 12:30.

Early comers to the range are welcomed (for help setting up - roughly anywhere after 12 noon/12:30

After the range this Sunday, a gathering at the Camille residence - roughly 7 miles away in Northwood. Kenny will be making his sweet and sour meatballs with rice. If you aren't into meatballs/rice, you can rummage through the Camille fridge to find something you like to eat, or bring something you do like. Desserts, refreshments/drinks will be served as well (byob) - board games, darts, Guitar Hero or Rock Band, for those interested.

Camille Home:
Kenny and Renee
35 Bow St.
Northwood, NH 03261
phone: 942.8229
item.name: First "Church" of the Gun
